nodes.text: Corrik was a female Miraluka sergeant of the Galactic Republic at the time of the Third Galactic War, functioning as a Demolitionist by 3626 BBY.

Corrik appears as a boss in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Onslaught expansion. Corrik only makes an appearance in the Imperial plotline, given that her role is replaced by Sergeant Kodo in the Republic version of the story.

In the Imperial storyline, Corrik, together with Republic officers Meinar and Osonu, fight the Commander, Darth Krovos, and Darth Rivix, when they arrive at the Dantooine Jedi Enclave to find clues regarding the whereabouts of Darth Malgus. Corrik's group is killed by the Commander's party after their confrontation.
